code: @Override public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     exchange.getIn().setBody("Monday").     exchange.getIn().setHeader("name", "Christian").     exchange.setProperty("item", "7"). }

@Test public void testOverridingProperties() throws Exception {     Exchange exchange = template.request("direct:a", new Processor() {          @Override         public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {             exchange.getIn().setBody("Monday").             exchange.getIn().setHeader("name", "Christian").             exchange.setProperty("item", "7").         }     }).     assertEquals("Dear Christian. You ordered item 7 on Monday.", exchange.getOut().getBody()).     assertEquals("Christian", exchange.getOut().getHeader("name")). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:a").to("velocity:org/apache/camel/component/velocity/example.vm?propertiesFile=org/apache/camel/component/velocity/velocity-logging.properties").         }     }. }
